sourcesContent: import { Grid, Paper, Typography } from '@mui/material' import { Box } from '@mui/system' import React from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' function products({ products }) { const navigate = useNavigate() const handleView=()=>{ navigate('/view') } return ( {products.map((item) => {item.name} {item.discription} watchlist add to cart )} ) } export default products
